about_the_game:
Coffee Talk Episode 2 - Digital Artbook

Concept art and original artwork from Coffee Talk Ep. 2: Hibiscus & Butterfly.

DLC Content
This DLC package contains Coffee Talk Episode 2 - Digital Artbook. A digital PDF artbook containing original artwork and concept art from Coffee Talk's game artists, Dio Mahesa, Hendry Roesly, Kriswin Yuniar, Junkipatchi, and many more.

Accessing The DLC
After purchasing and downloading Coffee Talk Episode 2 - Artbook, you can access the content in the game's directory folder. Here are the steps to access the files:
  • Open up Steam and go to your Library tab
  • Right click on Coffee Talk Episode 2: Hibiscus & Butterfly and select Properties
  • In the Properties window, select Local Files tab and find the "Browse Local Files" button.
  • This will take you to the Coffee Talk Episode 2: Hibiscus & Butterfly's game directory, which has the Artbook folder included in it.

Coffee Talk Episode 2 - Digital Artbook

Concept art and original artwork from Coffee Talk Ep. 2: Hibiscus & Butterfly.

DLC Content
This DLC package contains Coffee Talk Episode 2 - Digital Artbook. A digital PDF artbook containing original artwork and concept art from Coffee Talk's game artists, Dio Mahesa, Hendry Roesly, Kriswin Yuniar, Junkipatchi, and many more.

Accessing The DLC
After purchasing and downloading Coffee Talk Episode 2 - Artbook, you can access the content in the game's directory folder. Here are the steps to access the files:
  • Open up Steam and go to your Library tab
  • Right click on Coffee Talk Episode 2: Hibiscus & Butterfly and select Properties
  • In the Properties window, select Local Files tab and find the "Browse Local Files" button.
  • This will take you to the Coffee Talk Episode 2: Hibiscus & Butterfly's game directory, which has the Artbook folder included in it.
